pred_ans_conf_NL_MCQ: The kinetic molecular theory explains the physical behavior of gases.The kinetic molecular theory is a well-established and widely accepted theory that explains the physical behavior of gases, including their pressure, volume, and temperature. It is based on the idea that gas molecules are in constant motion and that their collisions with the walls of the container and with each other determine the physical properties of the gas
pred_ans_conf_OE: The theory that explains the physical behavior of gases is the kinetic molecular theory.
